    Tooth and Claw

    We are a group of mathematicians, statisticians and biologists who develop automated algorithms and softwares for morphological studies.

    Installations

    1. Download and Install 3D Slicer: website
    2. Download the ‘Auto3dgm’ module. Type in the terminal: 
      git clone --recursive https://github.com/ToothAndClaw/auto3dgmSlicerExtension
    3. Open 3D Slicer and install the required dependencies for Auto3dgm. Type in the Python interactor: 
      pip_install("scipy")
pip_install("mosek")
    4. Manually install ‘Auto3dgm’ module in 3D Slicer.
      • In 3D Slicer, select Extension Wizard

    • Click Select Extension and choose the folder auto3dgmSlicerExtension

    • Click yes to load the ‘Auto3dgm’ and the ‘webviewer’ modules
